indications_original: Clonidine hydrochloride tablets are indicated in the treatment of hypertension. Clonidine hydrochloride tablets may be employed alone or concomitantly with other antihypertensive agents.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clonidine Hydrochloride Tablets, USP are supplied as:
                  0.3 mg
                  White rounded off oval shaped, biconvex tablets with score line having "U" and "137" debossed across the score line on one side and plain on other side.
                  
                  NDC: 70518-2203-00
                  NDC: 70518-2203-01
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
